fields.name: send_id
fields.doc: NGAP required unique id for this request, this user, and this channel (concat request_id + user_notification_id)

fields.name: start_time
fields.doc: UTC time in milliseconds when this service began processing this record

fields.name: end_time
fields.doc: The time in UTC millseconds when this service existed

fields.name: received_time
fields.doc: UTC time in milliseconds that this service received this request

fields.name: publish_time
fields.doc: UTC time in milliseconds that this service published its output

fields.name: record_type
fields.doc: The lifecycle state this record is in

fields.name: time_taken
fields.doc: The time in milliseconds that this record took to process within this application
